data.eml:eml: Review of the Chinese Hyperomias Marshall (Coleoptera: Curculionidae: Entiminae) with description of a new species

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Ren, Li, Alonso-Zarazaga, Miguel A., Zhang, Runzhi (2007): Review of the Chinese Hyperomias Marshall (Coleoptera: Curculionidae: Entiminae) with description of a new species. Zootaxa 1562: 1-42, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.178348
